person.content:

Paragraph: The Kisangani office of the medical charity Medecins sans Frontieres said on Friday that more than 100,000 refugees were trekking northwest from the Goma-Bukavu area and many of them were now in the town of Walikale .

| Kisangani office of Medecins sans Frontieres |
